query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative approach to music videos and performance influence the evolution of pop culture and the music industry in the decades following his rise to fame?

query_2.text: How did Whitney Houston's unique vocal style and emotional delivery contribute to her status as one of the most influential artists in pop and R&B music history?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's ability to reinvent his musical style and persona throughout his career reflect the cultural and social changes of the times?

query_4.text: How did Freddie Mercury's unique blend of cultural influences and personal experiences shape his artistic identity and the evolution of Queen's music?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's musical evolution over the years reflected her personal experiences and challenges, particularly in relation to her mental health and public persona?

query_6.text: How did Bob Marley's music and message contribute to the global awareness of social and political issues in Jamaica during the 1970s?
